message.content: {"given_definition_quality":5,"better_definition":"to get up; to rise","sentence":"学生起来。","image_prompt":"In a soft apocalypse animation style, show a student (teenager) rising from a simple bed in a minimal, softly ruined room. Soft daylight comes through a cracked window, dust particles visible, but the mood is hopeful. The student is mid-motion, sitting up with hands braced on the bed, emphasizing the act of getting up.","sentence_translation":"The student gets up."}
